runs.comm: this was bowled a bit short and he swivels and pulls to deep square leg, should have been two
this was banged in a bit short again and he fetches it from outside off and pulls straight to mid-on
full and straight this time and he gets forward to defend
fullish on middle and leg and clipped to midwicket
good length outside off and punched to the off side
that's a gift for Swart! Hendricks drifts on the pads and swings it away, fine leg is up and just a gentle tickle is needed to get it past the man
he stays back and tucks it to the on side
close call for Borren! This was fractionally short and he miscues the pull and just clears midwicket where Morkel leaps
this was fuller in length outside off and he makes room and drills it to mid-off
fullish and moving away and driven down to cover
he stays beside the line and dabs it down to third man
slapped over point! This was short and wide outside off, Myburgh stood back at the crease and carved it high over the infield, one bounce and four
Good start this is for Netherlands! This was drifting on the pads, fine leg was up, Myburgh didn't try to hit it too hard and clipped it to long leg
Boy did he time that! This was pitched up on the pads, Myburgh stayed at the crease and nonchalantly swung that over fine leg, went quite a few rows back
good comeback by Tsotsobe, this was a slower ball outside off and he slashed and missed
swatted over mid-off but not really in control, he made room and smacked it just over mid-off's reach (Steyn), more like a tennis forehand
full on the stumps and pushed to the on side
fires that outside the off stump and he slashes and misses
tries to force a full delivery and ends up mistiming it to deep midwicket
nothing going right for South Africa so far! Steyn fired this one short and it was too quick and high for the keeper as well, cleared everyone and four byes
stays beside the line and he punches it to the off side
quick one outside off and it fizzes past the outside edge as he looks to cut
Myburgh's determined to stay put and whack everything, another short one and looking to slam it over point, missed it completely
that's exactly what he was trying to do! This was short and wide outside off, the height of the ball was good enough for him to slam that over point, forget about chasing it
take that! Slower ball, outside off, Myburgh was waiting for it, stays back and wallops it wide of extra  cover and the packed off side field
full on the pads and he works it down to midwicket

high and just over the rope! This was a fuller one outside off, Myburgh fetches that and manages to slog him across the line, it was miles up in the air but had enough to clear the rope, Morkel could only watch
he looks to pull but mistimes it to short fine leg
stays beside the line and punches it to cover
another freebie for Myburgh! This was bowled full and wide outside the off stump, he bends and carves it over mid-off

great save by AB at deep midwicket! Myburgh pulls a short one and doesn't time it as well as he would have liked, AB back-pedalled, caught it and lobbed it barely a second before stepping on the rope, good presence of mind

Terrific catch by the captain himself! Swart made room to a shorter one and looked to clear mid-off, ended up slapping it and Faf du Plessis had to cover a lot of ground to his right at mid-off, timed his dive well and took the catch
lovely cut! This was short and moving across and he stayed beside the line and slapped it wide of backward point
he stays back and whips it to the on side
the googly, he punches it towards cover and takes a single to reach his fifty!
this was spinning away and he gently dabbed it to short third man
the sharp spinning googly, he fetched that from outside off and pulled it to long-on
full on the stumps and drilled back to the bowler
tossed up and he sweeps firmly, Steyn mops up at deep square leg
That was clever! Duminy fires that one flat from round the wicket, Barresi got in position quickly for the reverse sweep and neatly paddled that wide of short third man
fires that too wide outside the off stump
Going, going....! Tossed up and Barresi gets on his knee and plays the slog, gets a lot of miles on that shot and it's sailing over deep midwicket
Tucks it away behind square

will this be a game-changer? Tossed up on middle and leg and that drew Myburgh to come down the track, he played all around it, got an inside edge to the stumps and the bat slipped out of his hand as well
he gets on his knee and sweeps to short fine leg
works it off his pads to short fine leg
this was quicker and flatter and he looked to smash this to the leg side and mistimed it

another one down and SA are pumped up! This was fired through much quicker and flatter from Tahir, Barresi was hit low on the pads as he tried to flick it away, Hawkeye however shows that missing the leg stump, a frustrated Barresi walks off
gets forward and drives to the off side
gets right across his stumps and sweeps to deep square leg
didn't pick the googly, was looking to play for the leg break
this was fullish in length outside off and driven to cover, a few inches more and he would have bisected the gap
good length outside the off stump, he swings and misses
he punches this one to the off side and the fielder has a shy at the bowler's end and there's an overthrow, SA can't afford this
gets an outside edge down to third man as he looks to drive
that's a good slower ball from Hendricks, shorter and on the leg stump and the batsman decided not to play at it
punched down the ground! Hold the pose... This was pitched up outside off, Borren plays it through the line and times it well, beats mid-off
flatter one outside off and he drives to mid-off
that was a clean strike! Tahir gives this a bit more air, Borren stays at the crease, gets down on his knee and slogs him over deep midwicket

Tahir strikes back after getting slammed for six! Not the smartest shot you would say, a flatter delivery and Borren moved tor far across the stumps to sweep and exposed all three stumps, the ball strikes the pads plumb in front, no doubts about this one
driven on the up and just wide of backward point
down the track and he pushes a flatter ball to the covers
tossed up a bit too wide outside off and he drives to deep cover
this was fractionally short and he swivels and pulls flat to deep midwicket
slower ball and he gently dabs it down to third man
would have been a great catch has he held on! This was short and wide outside off, had to reach for it, Amla flings himself to his left at backward point but the ball evades him
this was too wide outside off, even Tom Cooper couldn't reach it
fuller and wide and he cuts hard wide of backward point, good effort by Steyn at third man but can't prevent two
bisected that gap really well! Tom Cooper gets a low  full toss on the pads which he flicks very well with his wrists, wide long-on and deep midwicket were completely defeated
chases a wide one and he ends up chopping it to the keeper
fires that straight on the stumps and he stays back and defends
fires that full on the off stump and he punches it to the off side
shorter ball this time and Cooper does well to adjust and deftly dab it to third man
that was a really good bouncer to Ben Cooper who does well to bend and evade it, really fizzed past the helmet

the bouncer gets him this time! He may have survived the previous ball but Steyn had another one coming, really quick for the left-handed Ben, he bent and looked to evade it but the ball took the glove and lobbed up, de Kock jogged to his right and took it
punches it to the off side, steps out but can't pinch a run there

Tahir hits the timber and SA are right back in this! Tom Cooper looked to pull this one, it was a quicker delivery, looked like it went between his legs, swing and a miss and Tahir sets off for his celebratory run
skidded outside the off stump and he cuts just wide of Amla at point
the slower one and the googly, didn't really pick it and he ended up chopping it onto his pads
that was so close to hitting the top of the stumps! The quicker one, skidded through, he made room and looked to cut, de Kock gloves it but it stings

Netherlands are starting to crumble under pressure here! Tahir tosses it up, Seelar decides that going over the top is the only way to go, gets on his knee and looks to clear long-on, can't clear Duminy
no five-for for Tahir, the batsman just gets forward and blocks it
he comes round the wicket, van Beek very half-heartedly looks to poke it to the off side
another forward defence! On the stumps and blocked away
a bit wider this time and he pushes at it uppishly and places it wide of cover
Bukhari makes a bit of room and looks to pull but mistimes it to mid-on
this one was short outside the off stump and van Beek looks to carve it over point but misses
quiet end to the over with a slower one, van Beek decides to push it back to the bowler
cleared the keeper! A short one from Tsotsobe, he looks to hook and ends up placing it over the keeper, one bounce and four

the pressure getting to the Netherlands again! Bukhari pulled this one to wide long-on, van Beek wanted the second but bukhari wasn't interested, van Beek was more than half way down the track but it was too late
full outside off and drilled to the off side
this was short and wide outside the off stump and he arches back and cuts to third man, in the air but safe
tries to drill this wide of cover but mid-off cuts it off
tries to steer this one down to third man but only just evades the keeper, thoughts of a second but they wisely decide not to
close call again for the batsmen, too close to cut as he looked to scoop it to third man, close to the edge
gives him a bit of width and he punches it down to point, can't get a run there
he can't pinch a run here too, defends to the off side, they are better off seeing off Steyn
breaks free here with a punch just wide of mid-on, Morkel gives the chase and manages to pull it back
this was banged in short and he quickly ducked under the bouncer, close to being called a wide, one for the over signals the umpire
they have seen off his last over without losing a wicket, they nearly did though as van der Gugten poked his bat out looking to push it to the off side

excellent fielding by Faf and almost a run out! This was slapped towards mid-off and Fal flung himself to his right and threw to the bowler. missed the stumps and Tsotsobe's under-arm flick was off target too with the batsman short
chips this one over the infield but mid-on was pushed back

was that really necessary! The batsman needn't have looked to go over the top with the fielder pushed back, this was short and he was down the track and looked to slap this one over long-on, miscued and Miller took it easily

and Steyn's dropped it! It's not over yet, he needlessly looked to chip this one over the infield, this was in the air for a while, Steyn covered plenty of ground running forward from deep midwicket but spilled it on the dive
makes room and drills this one just wide of extra cover
it's a low full toss outside off and he makes room and pinches it wide of point
nicely played, he stays back and dabs it to third man, singles will do it
he gently tucked this one towards square leg and thought of a single but they decide against it

South Africa get over the line with the skin of their teeth! Hendricks comes round the wicket and fires in a short ball, van der Gugten arches backwards and risky playing at it, looks to carve this down to third man but gets a thin edge, de Kock knows it and Steve Davis' finger was up quickly
